name: Geirskogul
help:
Delivers an attack to all enemies in a straight line before you with a potency of 2,000 for the first enemy, 25% less for the second, 50% less for the third, and 75% less for all remaining enemies. Removes Blood of the Dragon status and all eyes from your Dragon Gauge.
Additional Effect: Grants Life of the Dragon
Life of the Dragon Bonus: Increases potency of Jump and Spineshatter Dive by 50%
Duration: 15s
Can only be executed while under the effect of Blood of the Dragon.
Dragon Gauge Cost: 3
